about_the_game:
The Artbook & Strategy Guide for Shadow Gambit: The Cursed Crew are two books in one PDF file.

Only available in English.

Artbook content:
  • Discover 64 pages filled with early concepts and captivating artworks depicting the world and characters of Shadow Gambit: The Cursed Crew.
  • Gain deeper insights into the visual designs of the game and the creative process behind them.

Strategy Guide content:
  • Get a comprehensive guide to the game, explaining the features of its unique Stealth Strategy gameplay across 120 pages.
  • Acquire valuable tips on utilizing the characters' unique skills effectively and how to defeat the enemy types of the Inquisition.
  • Learn different strategies to master the missions and overcome challenges that await on your pirate adventure.

Please note that this is additional content and does not include the base game.
